startPage.heroText:
Unlock your next adventure
by tailoring suggestions to
what excites you. Whether it's
Play, Purpose, or Passion,
we'll help you find the perfect fit.

introPage.title: Live Life Unstoppable!
introPage.description:
Take this quick and fun quiz to find
out what activities suit you best! No
right or wrong answers, just choose
what feels most like you.
It'll only take 3-5 minutes.

At the end, you'll receive activity
suggestions that you're likely to enjoy.
Live Life Unstoppable!

sharePage.title:
Time to
Pursue Your Ideals!
sharePage.qrText:
Scan the QR code to
discover your Ideal Pursuits!
sharePage.downloadText:
Don't forget to screenshot or save the image
to your phone so you can refer to it anytime.
